title: 5th Floor Newly Renovated and Spacious 1x1! Pet Friendly
posting_body: Use this link for more information:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 986 Sq.
Come join a Kirkland community devoted to nurturing your love of nature while simultaneously providing a remarkable array of metropolitan conveniences.
Our spacious and pet-friendly studio, one, two, and three-bedroom floor plans feature modern design elements and amenities.
Marvel at the sandy beach, boardwalk trails, fine dining, shopping, and nightlife options…all steps from your apartment!
Sailhouse represents the ideal backdrop for your life.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
